title: Development of Integrated PPK and PCK Strategies for Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary education curriculum fundamentals and social studies content knowledge
context.additional_context: Most learners are current elementary school teachers who recognize the need to link PPK and PCK in social studies instruction but struggle with practical application methods.

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more strategies for integrating PPK (Pedagogical/ Psychological Knowledge) and PCK (Subject-Specific Pedagogical Knowledge) when designing social studies lessons.
Learners can develop one actual lesson scenario integrating PPK and PCK in computer-based learning environments and receive peer evaluation.
Learners can analyze cognitive difficulties learners may face when using multiple representations in social studies classes based on PPK and derive two or more PCK-based solutions.

resources: Social studies multiple representation resources database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
